item.title: About Me
item.description: Hey there! My name is Seth Moeckel, and I really enjoy designing & building digital products. I was about 12 years old when I started messing with computers. I really didn’t understand much, but I wanted to know how things worked, and how I could make my ideas real. I started taking appliances apart, building robots with microcontrollers, and writing small scripts for my Raspberry Pi. It took a while but I began to grasp programming, and how to build my own programs.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Senior Software Engineer
item.description: Web Development on a game-changing lifestyle apartments company built on the combination of long term leasing, tenant-driven home sharing and furnished hotel stays.

item.title: Full Stack Software Engineer (Contactor)
item.description: Led Software Architecture and Backend Development for an amazing peer-2-peer content rating and recommendations platform. Later advised and helped drive hiring processes, as well as managing a highly distributed team of international developers.

item.title: Partner, Consultant
item.description: Led Software Architecture, Mobile Design & Development, DevOps and Backend Development for the new relaunch of a premier gig-economy solution for facilities management.
